track.name: This Is Heaven To Me
comments: This is definately Heaven to me!!!!
sounds good and old school. love it.
Luvvit !!
Belly rubbin' time :)
lovely
muito bom
Love it...

This is Doris Day reincarnated. Madeleine is trying to emulate other Blues/Jazz artists, but Doris shines through, just listen. Check any Doris disc & this is her sound/voice. Serious Film potential here.
She is right from heaven , with the voice of an Angel  plays the string of my heart ...
her voice is from a different, beautiful era
WOW!
not billie, but the closest i've heard... great talent!
Amazing voice and an atmospheric arrangement.
WOW - are you related to Billy Holiday? Awesome
Madeleine, yo are the only one!!!
I think I'm in love :-) or I'm in Heaven....to me.
Beautiful...Lady Day reincarnated? Maybe.
She´s amazing...
I am just discovering her and I am falling in love!  She has an old voice...like she's known too much of the world.  I dig that.
I love Mady!!!!!!
